article_title: Will An App A Day Keep The Doctor Away? The Coming Health Revolution

article_metadata.description: By Stephanie Tilenius, an executive in residence at Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers. With a big assist from technology, Americans are driving a major transformation of the nation’s health care system. Recent years have brought us the passage of the Affordable Care Act, technology advances in sensors and devices, cheaper personal [...]
